meta-review.comment: Step into the neon-lit streets of Shadowrun Hong Kong Extended Edition and you'll be tantalized by a cybernetic journey that's as intoxicating as a freshly brewed cup of soykaf. Harebrained Schemes has woven a captivating narrative web that will ensnare you with its immersive world and engaging characters. The turn-based combat is as satisfying as a well-timed headshot, and the strategic depth will keep you coming back for more. Whether you're a seasoned Shadowrunner or a newbie to the series, this Extended Edition is a must-play for any fan of cyberpunk RPGs. So hack into the matrix, dodge the corporate drones, and immerse yourself in the cyber-shadows of Hong Kong. Honestly, it's worth getting your hands on this game just to experience the pleasure of basking in the synthesized glow of the virtual cityscape.
